alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 26 at 1:14PM MST until January 29 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County, Southeast Johnson County and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. This will be a long duration event with impacts to travel for several days.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
